name: Bhagavad Gita
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada
genre: Spiritual, Philosophy, Religious, Self-Help, Classic Literature
description: Bhagavad Gita As It Is presents the divine conversation between Lord Krishna and Arjuna on the battlefield of Kurukshetra. It teaches timeless wisdom about duty, devotion, and the nature of the soul.

name: Ramayana
author: Valmiki
description: The Ramayana tells the story of Lord Rama, his exile, and the victory of good over evil.

name: Mahabharat
author: Vyasa
description: The Mahabharata depicts the Kurukshetra war and explores complex moral dilemmas, duty, and dharma.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
author: Chris Gardner
description: The story of Chris Gardner's struggle with homelessness while raising his son and pursuing a better life.

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A young boy discovers he's a wizard and attends Hogwarts, uncovering secrets about his past.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry returns to Hogwarts and discovers a hidden chamber that holds a deadly secret.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry learns the truth about Sirius Black, a mysterious prisoner with ties to his family.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry faces deadly challenges in the Triwizard Tournament while a dark power rises.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry forms Dumbledore's Army to fight the growing darkness within the wizarding world.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry uncovers Voldemort's past and learns about Horcruxes in this darker chapter.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione go on the run to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The epic final battle between good and evil unfolds at Hogwarts.

name: The Lord of The Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fellowship embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring and defeat Sauron.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia
author: C.S. Lewis
description: A magical wardrobe transports children into the mythical land of Narnia ruled by Aslan.

name: The Last Olympian
author: Rick Riordan
description: In the thrilling conclusion of the Percy Jackson and the Olympians series, Percy leads his friends in a desperate battle to defend Mount Olympus from the forces of Kronos. As New York City becomes the final battleground, Percy must face his destiny and make a choice that could change the fate of the gods and mortals forever.

name: एक चिहान (Ek Chihan)
author: Bishweshwar Prasad Koirala
description: A Nepali classic exploring themes of human struggle, politics, and morality.

name: मुनामदन (Muna Madan)
author: Laxmi Prasad Devkota
description: A poetic tale of love, loss, and humanity told through the story of Muna and Madan.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
description: A personal finance classic that contrasts two approaches to money, success, and independence.

name: Shireesh ko Phool
author: Parijat
description: A deeply emotional Nepali novel exploring love, pain, and the complexities of human emotion.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A tragic story of wealth, love, and obsession set in the Jazz Age of America.

name: Alex Ferguson: My Autobiography
author: Sir Alex Ferguson
description: The inspiring life story of football's most successful manager, sharing lessons from his career.
